thread.title: How can I maximise IHT breaks to invest for my granddaughter?

author: Ed Monk
title: How can I maximise IHT breaks to invest for my granddaughter?
text: Tax How can I maximise IHT breaks to invest for my granddaughter? Ask an expert: There are allowances that let you escape inheritance tax, if you know how to use them Grandparents can give thousands to a child without attracting inheritence tax. Photo: Alamy
